channel.title: Delete code?
channel.description:
I have duped items...
I need a code (and there is i forgot mine) that will delete any item the player has in bank, or in invintory.

item.title: Delete code?
item.dc:creator: @dragonchain dragonchain
item.description:
@dragonchain wrote:

[quote=“the elve age, post:12, topic:289847”][quote author=`Rich link=topic=383139.msg2876952#msg2876952 date=1248107734]

508 nerd

Nope, my server is #317, and the only resemblance you can see in that code is that it’s packaged.

Not to sound retarded. But where do i declare this method?

It wasn’t something to copy and paste, it was just an example of how to do it.
[/quote]

Ohhhhh okay okay i see… Thanks[br][br][size=1]Posted on: July 20, 2009, 10:42:48 am[/size][hr]But also. You could actually add a code saying,

for(int r=0; r<playerEquipment.length; r++) {
try {
int item = playerEquipment[r];
if((item > 0) && (item < 11999)) {
remove(item, r);
}
} catch(Exception e) { sM(“ERROR: Removing Equipment”); }
}
if(playerHasItem(5509)){
deleteItem(5509, 1);
}
if(playerHasItem(5510)){
deleteItem(5510, 1);
}
if(playerHasItem(5512)){
deleteItem(5512, 1);
}
if(playerHasItem(5514)){
deleteItem(5514, 1);
}
if(playerHasItem(6570)){
keep6570 = true;
deleteItem(6570, 1);
}[/quote]That would be completely retarded, knowing that } catch(Exception e) { isn’t used for that

Read full topic

item.title: Delete code?
item.dc:creator: @the_elve_age the elve age
item.description:
@the_elve_age wrote:

[quote="`Rich, post:8, topic:289847"]Example;

[code] int k = 0;
int[] dupedItems =
{
1038, 1040
};

for (int i : p.playerItems)
{
	if (i > 0)
	{
		for (int c : dupedItems)
		{
			if (i == c)
			{
				p.frames.removeItem(c, p.items.getSlot(c), 1);
			}
		}
	}
}
for (int i : p.playerBankItems)
{
	if (i > 0)
	{
		for (int c : dupedItems)
		{
			if (i == c)
			{
				p.playerBankItems[k] = 0;
				p.playerBankItemsN[k] = 0;
			}
		}
	}
	k++;
}[/code]

Wrote that in a minute or so, there’s probably better ways to do it, though.[/quote]

Not to sound retarded. But where do i declare this method?

Read full topic

item.title: Delete code?
item.dc:creator: @_Rich Rich
item.description:
@_Rich wrote:

Example;

[code] int k = 0;
int[] dupedItems =
{
1038, 1040
};

for (int i : p.playerItems)
{
	if (i > 0)
	{
		for (int c : dupedItems)
		{
			if (i == c)
			{
				p.frames.removeItem(c, p.items.getSlot(c), 1);
			}
		}
	}
}
for (int i : p.playerBankItems)
{
	if (i > 0)
	{
		for (int c : dupedItems)
		{
			if (i == c)
			{
				p.playerBankItems[k] = 0;
				p.playerBankItemsN[k] = 0;
			}
		}
	}
	k++;
}[/code]

Wrote that in a minute or so, there’s probably better ways to do it, though.

Read full topic
